channel.title: This is being a pain in the ass...i can't figure it out! please LOOK!
channel.description:
:mad: ok first of all i can't figure out what i need to make an efficient moparscape server. 1: can't make smelting...bow work..etc. 2: I can't even learn any tuts here...i looked at almost anything. 3: i can't download the jdk if you recommend that...if i need that damn this internet.. 4: I don't don't how to make obj's and monsters...npc's of all.... 5: CAN SOMEONE PLEASE HELP THIS IS MY 3RD DAY IN A ROW TRYING TO LEARN THIS!!!!! :mad: :mad: :mad:
ps. this would be most appreciated :P

it fast enough but it’s satellite and stuff so it’s a limited bandwidth (has a usage limit) and if i go over it makes ULTRA slow…you should add me so this can go faster i have msn…its sirousblack2@hotmail.com

How fast is your internet ?
